content:
Certainly! Here are some farm-to-table restaurants located in the Midwest:

1. The Bachelor Farmer - Located in Minneapolis, Minnesota, this restaurant sources its ingredients from local farmers and fishermen and serves modern, Scandinavian-inspired cuisine.

2. Local Harvest Cafe - Located in St. Louis, Missouri, this restaurant features organic, locally sourced ingredients, with many of its menu items coming straight from their own farm.

3. Harvest - Located in Louisville, Kentucky, this restaurant sources its ingredients from local farmers and produces modern Southern cuisine with a focus on seasonal ingredients.

4. Green Zebra - Located in Chicago, Illinois, this vegetarian restaurant sources its ingredients from local and organic farms and offers creative and seasonal dishes.

5. Ann Arbor Farmers Market - This farmers market in Ann Arbor, Michigan has several food vendors that serve farm-to-table cuisine, including seasonal salads, sandwiches, and baked goods made with locally sourced ingredients.

I hope you find these recommendations helpful!
